name: React
description: A JavaScript library for building web-application user interfaces, especially single-page applications. This website is built on it.

name: Java
description: A versatile, object-oriented programming language used for web, desktop, and mobile applications. See Game Sniper project entry for an example.

name: C
description: A foundational programming language used for system software, embedded systems, and performance-critical applications. See TA experience and thread project entry.

name: HTML5
description: The latest version of the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications. See in Bulletin Board project entry.

name: ARM Asm
description: Assembly language for ARM processors, used in embedded systems and low-level programming. See TA experience entry.

name: SQL
description: A domain-specific language for managing and querying relational databases. See Game Sniper project entry.

name: Python
description: A high-level, interpreted programming language used for web development, automation, data analysis, and more. See Superhero Data Analysis project entry for an example.

name: Lua
description: A lightweight scripting language often used for embedded systems and game development. See Friend Purge project entry for an example.

name: Verilog
description: A hardware description language used to model electronic systems and design digital circuits. Used heavily in my Computer Architecture course.

name: .NET Core
description: A cross-platform, open-source framework for building modern web, desktop, and cloud applications. Researched this a lot in my internship at Rose-Hulman Ventures.

name: Git
description: A distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code during software development. See my Github for examples.

name: Leadership
description: The ability to guide teams, manage projects, and drive successful outcomes in collaborative environments. I was the coordinator for many of my group projects including xv6 threads and Game Sniper.
